subject: Re: [junit] New To J Unit
msgSnippet: Hi u can use Junit but i suggest for ID like Jbuilder and all,if u are inter.. in testing j2ee application then go for junitee(u will get it in
messageBody:
Hi
u can use Junit but i suggest for ID like Jbuilder and
all,if u are inter.. in testing j2ee application then
go for junitee(u will get it in www.junitee.org)if u
need more help then mail me ur prob .. ok bye.
Reagrds
Prabhu
--- Preeti <preeti@...> wrote:
> Hello,
>
> I have never used JUnit before. I want to start
> creating test suite.
> But I donot know where to get started.
> The application to be tested is created using JSP's,
> Servelets,
> Struts and Java files. It is based on MVC model. The
> application is
> deployed on Tomcat and is IE based.
>
> First this I want to know is Can I use JUnit to test
> this
> application.
>
> What kind of applications can be tested through
> JUnit ?
>
> Thanks,
> Preeti
>
>
>
>
>
